summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%) and rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 330 m) and light levels (up 6743 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 519 m), light levels (up 10201 lux), and rainfall (down 0.2 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 330.1m lower than yesterday, 518.6m lower than past week, 455.9m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 292m to a maximum of 1476m, averaging 432.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 951.5m and 888.8m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Expect overcast skies with low cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, humidity will be quite oppressive and gentle light winds are expected. Possible light showers, overcast skies with low cloud, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
